statements: SELECT * FROM historical_stock_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT stock_symbol, close_price, date FROM historical_stock_data WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT date, high_price, low_price, open_price, close_price FROM historical_stock_data WHERE stock_symbol = 'GOOGL' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT AVG(close_price), MAX(high_price), MIN(low_price) FROM historical_stock_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT stock_symbol, COUNT(*) FROM historical_stock_data GROUP BY stock_symbol HAVING COUNT(*) > 100;
SELECT * FROM historical_stock_data WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT stock_symbol, date, close_price FROM historical_stock_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT AVG(close_price), MAX(high_price) FROM historical_stock_data WHERE stock_symbol = 'GOOGL' GROUP BY stock_symbol;
SELECT stock_symbol, date, open_price, close_price FROM historical_stock_data WHERE close_price > open_price AND date BETWEEN '2021-06-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY close_price DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, date, high_price - low_price AS price_range FROM historical_stock_data WHERE stock_symbol IN ('TSLA', 'AMZN') ORDER BY price_range DESC, date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM historical_stock_data;
SELECT symbol, close_price, date FROM historical_stock_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT symbol, high_price, low_price FROM historical_stock_data WHERE volume > 1000000;
SELECT * FROM stock_metadata WHERE sector = 'Technology';
SELECT symbol, company_name, industry FROM stock_metadata ORDER BY symbol ASC;
SELECT symbol, close_price FROM historical_stock_data WHERE date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT company_name, sector, industry FROM stock_metadata ORDER BY sector ASC
SELECT symbol, high_price, low_price FROM historical_stock_data WHERE volume > 1000000 ORDER BY low_price DESC
SELECT * FROM (SELECT symbol, close_price FROM historical_stock_data WHERE volume > 500000) AS A WHERE A.close_price > 100
SELECT symbol, company_name, sector, industry FROM historical_stock_data AS H INNER JOIN stock_metadata AS S ON H.symbol = S.symbol
SELECT * FROM stock_prices ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, high_price, low_price FROM stock_prices WHERE symbol='AAPL';
SELECT symbol, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE date='2022-01-01';
SELECT company_name, industry FROM stock_metadata WHERE sector='Technology';
SELECT * FROM stock_volume WHERE volume > 1000000 ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM stock_metadata LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, date, open_price, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT symbol, sector, industry FROM stock_metadata WHERE sector = 'Technology' ORDER BY symbol ASC;
SELECT MAX(high_price), MIN(low_price), AVG(close_price) FROM stock_prices;
SELECT symbol, company_name, sector, industry FROM stock_metadata WHERE symbol IN ('AAPL', 'GOOGL', 'MSFT') ORDER BY sector, symbol;
SELECT date, ticker, close FROM stock_prices
SELECT ticker, company_name FROM stock_company
SELECT industry_id, industry_name FROM stock_industry
SELECT exchange_id, exchange_name FROM stock_exchange
SELECT open, high, low FROM stock_prices
SELECT * FROM stock_prices WHERE ticker = 'AAPL' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT ticker, close FROM stock_prices WHERE close > 100 ORDER BY close ASC;

SELECT sp.date, sc.company_name, si.industry_name FROM stock_prices sp JOIN stock_company sc ON sp.ticker = sc.ticker JOIN stock_industry si ON sc.ticker = si.industry_id WHERE si.industry_name = 'Technology';
SELECT se.exchange_name, sp.ticker, sp.close FROM stock_exchange se JOIN stock_prices sp ON se.exchange_id = sp.ticker WHERE sp.close < 50;

SELECT sp.ticker, sp.date, si.industry_name FROM stock_prices sp JOIN stock_company sc ON sp.ticker = sc.ticker JOIN stock_industry si ON sc.ticker = si.industry_id WHERE si.industry_name IN ('Technology', 'Healthcare') ORDER BY sp.date ASC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM stock_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, close_price FROM stock_data WHERE close_price > 100 ORDER BY close_price DESC;
SELECT symbol, sector, industry FROM company_info WHERE sector = 'Technology';
SELECT * FROM stock_trends WHERE trend_score > 0.8 AND trend_direction = 'Up' ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT symbol, volume, avg_volume FROM stock_volume WHERE volume > avg_volume * 1.2 ORDER BY symbol ASC;
SELECT symbol, close_price FROM stock_data WHERE date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM company_info ORDER BY industry, sector;
SELECT symbol, trend_score, trend_direction FROM stock_trends WHERE trend_score > 0.7 ORDER BY trend_score DESC;
SELECT symbol, date, volume, avg_volume FROM stock_volume WHERE volume > avg_volume * 2 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT symbol, ex_dividend_date, dividend_amount, payment_date FROM stock_dividends WHERE dividend_amount > 1.5 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
